extendedInfo.description: ===============================IMPORTANT: CLZ Books is NOT a stand-alone app!This is an add-on for Book Collector for PC or Mac.(available for $29.95 here: http://www.collectorz.com/book/ )You need Book Collector to catalog your book collection and EXPORT data and images to this CLZ Books for Android.** Without Book Collector, this app is useless! **===============================Are you using Collectorz.com's Book Collector to catalog your book collection?Then CLZ Books is a great companion, to browse, sort andsearch your book collection (and your wish list!) on your Android device.Just use the Export to CLZ Books feature in Book Collector toexport your existing database (including images) to this Android app.Features:* Import your collection data and images from the Windows or Mac edition  - Use Wi-Fi to transfer directly from Windows or Mac to your Android device.  - Or: Export to a file in the Win/Mac version, then copy the file to your     Android's SD card* Browse your In Collection items, your Wish List, or your entire database,   using the 3 main tabs on the top left: All, Collection, Wish List* View your book lists in 2 different views:  - List : showing a small cover, title, author, year and index nr.  - Thumbnail Wall: just cover image thumbnails, but lots of em.* Sort your book lists by Author, Title, Year or Index, asc. or desc.* Search your database by Author, Title or ISBN* Group your items into folders. Choose from:   Author, Publisher, Genre, Subject, Series, Year, Condition and more...* Tap a book in any view to go to the Book Details page:  - ISBN, Publisher, Genres, Subject, etc... and your personal information.  - Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next book, or just swipe.  - Shake iPhone to go to a random book in your current list.  - Choose from 4 styles: Blue, Black, Purple, White* Tap small cover image on Details Page to go the Large Cover Page:	- Use the Prev/Next go the previous or next book, or just swipe.	- Tap the image to return to Details Page.* Supports Portrait and Landscape modes in all views and pages.REQUIREMENTS:- Book Collector 7.1 for Windows or later. or- Book Collector 3.5 for Mac OS X (or newer)RECOMMENDED (needed to transfer data over Wi-Fi):- Wi-Fi connection to the same local network that your desktop computer is in.- Apple Bonjour service.

reviews.title: I love book collector pc but
reviews.comment: The app could def do SO much better...im cataloging all my books..about 1000 now...i take about 25 books up a flight of stairs at a time to my pc to catalog...if i could add and edit on this app i could easily go through it on the shelves without lugging them all upstairs...come on..you put an amazing amount of energy into the pc version you can do it with the app! Anyway, i still like it because i always have it with me so i dont end up with duplicates....and to relish in my collection...thats it...
reviews.author: Jack Knife

reviews.title: So much to say
reviews.comment: I love Book Collector for PC, and willingly forked over the money for it. I was equally excited to find an Android companion app. However, I am quite miffed about the cost and lack of features. First I had to update my PC version ($24.95 AUD) to be able to sync with the $10 Android version I had just bought. GREEDY BUGGERS.  As for features, the few that exist certainly don\'t justify the price tag. The Android app needs to be able to sync with PC or Mac version, needs to be editible and I should be able to add and delete from Android. Considering how much money I just paid, it\'s not a lot to ask for. The PC version gets 5 stars, but the Android app only deserves 2 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Disappointing
reviews.comment: I purchased this app thinking it would make capturing books into my library easier & faster. I can\'t add/edit or even scan books into my database via my mobile. Instead I\'m still forced to lug all my books to my pc for adding to my collection. I love the pc version, but his app should allow adding/editing/synchronization to be worth the money I paid for it.
reviews.author: Patrizia Elisabeth Schwartz

reviews.title: Nice... But
reviews.comment: Nice start but needs major work. The only purpose this app serves is to tell you what books you own while you\'re at the bookstore so you don\'t buy duplicates. The iPhone /ipad app is a thousand times better; you can actually add books with the app. Why would you assume that Android users would not appreciate this feature? As this app is, it should have been FREE!!
reviews.author: Steven Alford

reviews.title: Not what it was
reviews.comment: Connection hassles android 2.2. Motorola defy. Not easy to use. Paid app is 5 stars. Android is @#$%&.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Surprising savings!
reviews.comment: This app had paid for itself several times over by allowing me to NOT buy duplicate books when I\'m in the bookstore!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not as good
reviews.comment: Android Not as good as iphone app - can\'t group by author folders don\'t work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
reviews.comment: Program is lightweight. All files are stored to SD Card. Runs quickly. Loads fast. Picture quality is stunning. Search option is lightning fast. A++
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Nice
reviews.comment: Would like to be able to add book\'s to this app and sync it to my computer, to finish editing the details. Would like to see more Icelandic book\'s in the database
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works as advertized
reviews.comment: Installed via WiFi to use with my PC version. Perfect on Samsung Galaxy S2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app could find
reviews.comment: Had Bookbag but they haven\'t updated for years so switched to this app. Love most of it. Wish I could see series # on mobile app though. Droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks for support!
reviews.comment: I got help on a Sunday and now app is working perfectly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Used to be a fantastic app until I updated it and now it doesn\'t pass the license check with the market. (Nexus s) It\'s garbage now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Extension of Desktop Program.
reviews.comment: This app rules. I go to the book store and know immediately what I have or need for books. Easy transfer of data over wifi and excellent support. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Have to repurchase after update.
reviews.comment: If the initial purchase of the app was not from the market, the app needs to be repurchased to get the update.  Very not cool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great way to keep a full inventory of your personal book Collection.
